entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 25.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 35 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 33.
